title: Privacy Policy
intro: Ekobol is an automation platform offering marketplace integration, sales management, inventory-order management, and AI-powered marketing tools for e-commerce businesses under one roof. We accept user data security as a corporate responsibility. This policy is a transparent disclosure of our data processing procedures in compliance with GDPR and KVKK standards.
p1: We process the following data categories to maintain our service quality and fulfill our legal obligations:
li1_desc: Name, surname, corporate email address, phone number, and billing information required for user registration and verification. These data are processed based on the legal ground of contract establishment and performance.
li2_desc: Product catalogs, stock statuses, and order data pulled from e-commerce marketplaces (Trendyol, Hepsiburada, Amazon, etc.) integrated under your authorization. These data are processed solely to provide dashboard services to you and are not shared with third parties.
li3_desc: IP addresses, device information, browser type, and session logs providing access to the service. These data are recorded for legal compliance and to ensure system security (Cyber attack detection, etc.).
p2: Our platform is designed with a 'Privacy-First' architecture that respects user privacy. Only session cookies that are technically mandatory for the system to function are used. Third-party cookies that perform behavioral analysis, provide ad targeting, or track you across other sites are not used in our system. Please review our Cookie Policy for details.
p3: Your collected personal data is processed by our company for the following legitimate purposes:
use_list: Fulfillment of SaaS service contract requirements and uninterrupted service provision.
Instant synchronization of marketplace integrations and ensuring data consistency.
Processing of payments and management of billing processes.
Detection of potential technical issues, debugging, and improvement of system performance.
Resolution of legal disputes and meeting information requests from authorized public institutions.
p4: Your data is stored in cloud infrastructures (AWS/Google Cloud - Frankfurt/Ireland Region) with proven security at international standards. End-to-end TLS 1.3 encryption is applied during data transmission, and AES-256 encryption standards are applied at rest. Database access is subject to strict authorization policies (IAM).
p5: Under GDPR and relevant data protection laws, you have the right to learn whether your data is being processed, to request correction if incorrect, to request deletion (right to be forgotten) if the processing purpose ceases to exist, and to object to automated analysis results against you.
p6: Our company may update this policy in parallel with changes in legal legislation or service infrastructure. Significant changes will be notified via your registered email address.
contact: For all data security questions and rights requests, you can reach our Data Protection Officer at <1>privacy@ekobol.com</1>.
